Question.Subject: i want to watch pure pwnage but i dont live in Canada?
Question.Content: I've tried a proxy server but all the ones i use even when i enable scripts it still says they are disabled
Question.ChosenAnswer: Use a personal VPN, http://www.surfbouncer.com they have Canadian servers and IP addresses. Video works over the VPN. I use it for Hulu, BBC iPlayer and CCTV from outside all of the respective countries they are in.
